title: Ticket #3040: change the defaults for HGQ sort order and oversubscription
description:
change the defaults for HGQ sort order and oversubscription, specifically the new defaults will be: 

  GROUP_SORT_EXPR = ifThenElse(AccountingGroup=?="<none>",3.4e+38,ifThenElse(GroupQuota>0,GroupResourcesInUse/GroupQuota,3.3e+38))


  NEGOTIATOR_ALLOW_QUOTA_OVERSUBSCRIPTION = true
remarks:
2012-Jun-13 09:05:05 by smoler:
There may be a version history item representing this change in 7.8.1, but these configuration variables have never been documented. Definitions, please!

2012-Jun-15 12:02:16 by eje:
GROUP_SORT_EXPR was documented here: https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/chngview?cn=28851

But was removed here: https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/chngview?cn=28865

2012-Jun-15 12:12:45 by eje:
I originally didn't document NEGOTIATOR_ALLOW_QUOTA_OVERSUBSCRIPTION as it was introduced for a fairly Fermi-specific issue, however here is a definition:

NEGOTIATOR_ALLOW_QUOTA_OVERSUBSCRIPTION: If this configuration variable evaluates to True, the negotiator will allow static quotas of accounting groups to sum to a value greater than the quota of their parent accounting group. When set to False, accounting groups whose static quotas sum to more than their parent's quota will have their quotas normalized (rescaled) so that they sum to the value of their parent's quota.
